content: this simple easy-to-wear shawlette lets the colour do the heavy lifting while providing just enough texture for a fun knit and an eye-catching finished piece this pattern is straightforward and suitable for an adventurous beginner it would be a good introduction to a few intermediate skills yarn over knit two together wrapping yarn around needle twice in one stitch knitted cast on we have updated our skein sizes since this pattern was published the pattern can be adapted for our new 100 g / 150 g skeins and new yarn bases by working more or less of the border row as needed one circular needle 60 cm 24 or longer is recommended select a needle size that gives you the gauge and fabric you want see note on gauge for reference the shawl in the photos was knit using a 4 mm us 6 needle please subscribe to my newsletter 1 if you d like to stay in touch and hear about shop update 1 https //gaugedyeworks com/pages/newsletter-signup
